Posts.Content: phyllismarie wrote: Hello Ladies, I am brand new to this site and so far I love it.  I do have a question.  I was diagnosed with Stage 1 breast cancer.  I am Her2 positive.  I am receiving radiation 5 days a week and Herceptin 1 day a week for 52 weeks.  My doctor is now recommending chemo once every 3 weeks for 4 months.  Has anyone out there receiving this treatment.  My doctor says it is a controversial treatment adding the chemo but he recommends it highly. Dx 9/11/2010, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/0 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo phyllismarie dlb823
